title: Preparation and application of stimuli-responsive PET TeMs: RAFT graft block copolymerisation of styrene and acrylic acid for the separation of water–oil emulsions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14425-14437
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02117G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Indira B. Muslimova, Nurdaulet Zhumanazar, Galina B. Melnikova, Arman B. Yeszhanov, Zhanna K. Zhatkanbayeva, Sergei A. Chizhik, Maxim V. Zdorovets, Olgun Güven, Ilya V. Korolkov
In this study, we present a method to fabricate pH-sensitive membranes using UV-initiated RAFT graft copolymerization of styrene and acrylic acid on PET track-etched membranes for separation of water–oil emulsions.
